title: Number Play
description: Explore the fascinating world of numbers through games, patterns, and mathematical mysteries
learningObjectives: Understand divisibility rules and number properties
Explore palindromic numbers and digit patterns
Learn estimation and mental math strategies
Play mathematical games and find winning strategies

sections.title: 🎲 Numbers Tell Stories!
sections.content: Numbers are everywhere! They can tell us about heights, create patterns, and even play games with us! 🔢

sections.title: 🔍 Supercell Puzzles
sections.content: Find numbers that are greater than all their neighbors! Can you solve the supercell mystery?

sections.title: 🔄 Palindromic Numbers
sections.content: Discover numbers that read the same forwards and backwards! Try the reverse-and-add game!

sections.title: ✨ Kaprekar's Magic
sections.content: Experience the magic of 6174! Pick any 4-digit number and watch the magic unfold!

sections.title: 📏 Estimation Games
sections.content: How many times do you blink in a day? Let's estimate and explore numbers around us!

sections.title: 🎯 Mathematical Games
sections.content: Play the '21' game and discover winning strategies! Can you always win?
